info.title: Loss Modification Service
info.description:
The Loss Modification Service provides the API operation for performing Loss Modification analysis with one or more loss modification templates. 

You can use this service to retrieve single or multiple loss modification templates.

get.description: Retrieves upload information for Loss Modification Template import. It contains pre-signed URL for upload and an id to use in the Create import operation.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The type of file that will be uploaded. AWS S3 will issue a pre-signed URL for that type and will restrict other file types to be uploaded.

post.description: Submits a Loss Modification template import. It will start the import job.

get.description: Retrieves a set of Loss Modification Analysis Templates with filtering and pagination options.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before retrieving new records.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter conditions applied when retrieving the records.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The sort order applied on the retrieved items after filtering. It supports multiple properties.

200.description:
The request has succeeded.

Returns a collection of Loss Modification Templates.

post.description: Create a new Loss Modification template.

get.description:
Retrieves a single existing Loss Modification template by SID. 

**Note**: The retrieve operation doesn't include the template rules.

200.description:
The request has succeeded. 

Returns a Loss Modification Template specified in the request.

post.description: Submits a Loss Modification template export. It will start the export job.

parameters.name: fileType
parameters.description: The type of file to be generated. Supported formats are csv and lmtf.

get.description: Retrieves download info for an export. It contains pre-signed URL for downloading the file and id and type of the export. If the activity is still running it will return 400 Bad Request.
Retrieves a list of Loss Modification template rules with pagination options.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before retrieving new records.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The sort order applied on the retrieved items. It supports multiple properties.

post.description: Creates rules on a Loss Modification Template.

get.description: Retrieves a list of Loss Modification template rules with collisions.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before retrieving new records.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The sort order applied on the retrieved items. It supports multiple properties.

post.description: Creates a Loss Modification template draft. Edits to the template rules in the current session will be staged to that draft. Draft is per user and in the backend is created with the user id.

patch.description: Updates the Loss Modification template draft in the template. This operation starts a job which will combine the draft rules data with the template rules and run collision check. If no errors the update will succeed, if there are errors it will fail.  The draft is identified by user id.

delete.description: Deletes a Loss Modification template draft. This will discard all staged data. The draft is identified by user id.

get.description: Retrieves the modified template rules from the draft.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of records to skip before retrieving new records.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of records to retrieve.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: The sort order applied on the retrieved items. It supports multiple properties.

post.description: Creates rules on a Loss Modification Template draft.

put.description: Updates a Loss Modification Template rule on a draft.

delete.description: Deletes a rule from a Loss Modification template draft.

get.summary: Retrieve event parameters defined in a template.
get.description: Retrieves all event parameters defined in a specified template.

get.summary: Retrieve event parameters with their available operators and values.
get.description: Retrieves the predefined event parameters with their available operators and values.

tags.name: Template Draft Rule
tags.description: Loss Modification Template draft rule resource.

ExportDownloadInfo.description: Response returned when Export download is requested.
